Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein, 76318-054
From (b)(6) (b)(7)(C)
To Charisma Edge, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Lamine N'Diaye, Lee Plourde (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Staff (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) Shirley V. Skipper-Scott (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) NYM/Executive
Date 2019/07/26 10:10
Subject: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein, 76318-054
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Good morning all,
Epstein's attorneys are trying to get him his CPAP machine per our request. Can we have them hand-deliver it to medical staff as we have in previous instances?
Thank you,
(b)(6) (b)(7)(C)
(b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @gmail.com> 7/26/2019 9:50 AM >>>
Mr (b)(6) (b)(7)(C)
Is Mr. Epstein approved to receive a CPAP machine? If so, should we send it directly to him through the inmate mail system? Please confirm.
Thank you.
(b)(6) (b)(7)(C)
Page 1057

From (b)(6) (b)(7)(C)
To Charisma Edge, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Lamine N'Diaye, Lee Plourde (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Staff (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) Shirley V. Skipper-Scott (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) NYM/Executive
Date 2019/07/26 10:10
Subject: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein, 76318-054
Attachments: TEXT.htm

Good morning all,
Epstein's attorneys are trying to get him his CPAP machine per our request. Can we have them hand-deliver it to medical staff as we have in previous instances?
Is Mr. Epstein approved to receive a CPAP machine? If so, should we send it directly to him through the inmate mail system? Please confirm.

additional_notes: The document contains multiple redactions, indicated by (b)(6) (b)(7)(C), which suggests that personal identifying information has been removed for privacy or security reasons.
